title: Spike

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the factional kill by extending an arm, then butting your target with your spiky shoulder.
- Spike's ultimate ability, It raises spikes from the ground around your target, Giving them Immunity to all negative effects (including death) and astrally attacking all their visitors tonight and on the next night, if they aren't a mutant, they will die on the end of this effect. (1 use, shared by Killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Blocking will also roleblock a random visitor, if your Ultimate ability is active, you will attack a random visitor instead.

desc:
Post 3518
*A brown-colored, bipedal creature created from a mutated porcupine, it has muscular arms and a back covered with spikes.*
